general – provide various generic useful functions for kobe objects¶

These classes provide various functions for other kobe classes.

KButils¶

utils

provide various generic useful functions for kobe objects

KBplotter¶

visualization

provide various visualization functions.

vtilings

visualize one tiling network.

vgalaxies

visualize one galaxy network.

vtrigger

visualize a trigger map and its contours

vcandidates

visualize candidates.

KBcirculate¶

circulate

provide various functions to circulate KOBE products.

sn_data_analysis: sdapy
